synopsis.text: Together, university student Asumi and single father Naruse navigate an unconventional relationship that blossoms when Asumi becomes Naruse's housekeeper. Asumi, skilled in cooking and cleaning, is drawn to his employer's charm and good looks, despite initially identifying as straight. Naruse, a dedicated parent to his young son Ichika, finds himself struggling with his past and the complexities of balancing work, fatherhood, and his growing feelings for Asumi. As the two grow closer, they must confront Naruse's hidden secrets and the evolving nature of their connection. Will their love prevail, or will it succumb to the challenges that lie ahead? Join Asumi, Naruse, and Ichika in this heartwarming tale of love, family, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
